content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups:
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=34669, position=-18.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=34672, position=-12.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=34675, position=-9.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=34680, position=-10.5, 22.5)
- PipeGroup (fluid_system=34681, position=-6.5, 23.5)

### Laboratory at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of lab (position -17.5, 23.5).

### Electricity network
Consists of small electric poles at positions:
- Position (-15.5, 19.5)
- Position (-16.5, 19.5)
- Position (-19.5, 22.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure the second argument for placing pipes is a Direction object. Review the API documentation for the correct usage of the `place_entity` function.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
